text: Tum mein say jo log apni biwiyon say zahaar kertay hain (yani unhen maa keh bethtay hain) woh dar asal unn ki maayen nahi bann jatin unn ki maayen to wohi hain jin kay batan say woh peda huye yaqeenan yeh log aik na maqool aur jhooti baat kehtay hain be-shak Allah Taalaa moaf kerney wala aur bakshney wala hai
